price: Kanatsinda, nta co mwoshaka gushikako mu vyo mukora vyose ngo gishoboke, kiretse mu gihe Imana Allah Ibishatse. Mu vy’ukuri Imana Allah, Yamye ari Nyenubumenyikurivyose, Irazi umwe wese muri mwebwe kurusha, Intungane mu vyo Ikora.
arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا

meta.transliteration: wamā tashāūna illā an yashāa al-lahu inna al-laha kāna ʿalīman ḥakīman
